entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
